eksath arabi emir rajyaye jathyanthara rakiya apekshakayin sandaha del rakiya purappadu eya awasanaya dakwa, alewikarana rakiya, aasiyawe sapayum dama thanathuru wani del samanga dubayi hi rakiya laba gatha hakiya, injineru eksath arabi emir rajyaye wruththiya, deshiya thanathuru, nithignya adhyapanaya saha del hi wruththiya, jyeshta kalamanakarithwaya, meheyum katayuthu, manawa sampath saha del sewakayingen ek ayeku wiya hakiya dubayiwala rakiya saha yuropaya ha mada peradiga wadiyen rakiya purappadu gani.

jaiwa widya wishaya dharawa - mathara rahula widyalaye aar.ee. nisal punsara, bhauthika widya wishaya dharawa - kurunagala maliyadewa balika widyalaye ke.di.em.amaya dharmasiri, wanijya wishaya dharawa - kolambaa aananda widyalaye em.em.ee.muditha akalanka rajapaksha, kala wishaya dharawa - mahanuwara usas balika widyalaye aar.indiwari gawarammana, injineru thakshanawedaya wishaya dharawa - yapanaya,chunnakam skandawarodaya widyalaye kanakasundaram jathursajan, jaiwa paddhathi thakshanawedaya wishaya dharawa - kagalla swarna jayanthi maha widyalaye ke.malithi shashikala dilrangi, podu/wenath wishaya dharawa - kolambaa miyusiyas widyalaye thilara eekanayaka.
